title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Activity Theory-Based Co-Design of Electronic Musical Instrument Learning Services

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can propose improvements to user experiences in musical instrument learning services by applying core concepts of activity theory
A collaborative process is executed to enhance knowledge transfer efficiency between experts and non-experts by over 20% using a Co-Design Platform (CDP)
Actual usage scenarios of musical instrument learning services are analyzed and evaluated in a VR simulation environment to derive prototype improvements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
